Auckland bus driver assaulted: Fare dodgers on New Lynn 24R route beat man with skateboard https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-bus-driver-assaulted-fare-dodgers-on-new-lynn-24r-route-beat-man-with-skateboard/SLER3G3DWFEBPD7BYY34DHYGCM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-bus-driver-assaulted-fare-dodgers-on-new-lynn-24r-route-beat-man-with-skateboard/SLER3G3DWFEBPD7BYY34DHYGCM/ Raphael FranksThe assault comes within a month of an attack on another driver in Auckland last Saturday. Mon, 09 Sep 2024 17:00:00 +0000 An Auckland bus driver has been severely injured after getting beaten with a skateboard by fare dodgers during a late-night attack in the central city. Photo / Supplied
